title: How is your city's Library? Does anybody use it for studies?
selftext:
(This is government Library with A/C. Price â‚¹200/month. Open 24 hours, 7 days. Small city)

Library is seriously a lifesaver for me preparing for Gate 2024. I cannot study in my house. Library forces me to study. Recently I took a break from library due to the eye infection spreading in India, and I wasted all the time in my home reading novels and other things.

Do any of you use library for normal studies or for competetive exam preparation?  How much does it cost? And what facilities does it have. Also big city or small city?
comments:
Camera photo
Location- Lala Jagdalpuri library, Jagdalpur, Chhattisgarh, India 494001
Device- Samsung galaxy tab s8 5g 
Dimensions 1.68 MB, 2896Ã—2176, ISO 50, 13 mm, F2.2, 1/50s
This looks more like an expensive college's library
I have used VIT's library and this one feels better.
It doesn't have one
Which city is this? Do bbsr have one?
Jagdalpur, Chhattisgarh
what's the name of this library?
Ah this brings back memories
Location- Lala Jagdalpuri library, Jagdalpur, Chhattisgarh, India 494001

I study at home. Raipur got good libraries too but even the nearest one is at least 4 km away and it takes 20 minutes to get there. So I've a good study setup at home in my room and no one disturbs me when I'm studying so it's good also I got AC so it's always cold and relaxing here.

https://preview.redd.it/oi27hab0ammb1.png?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=92bc623d5b584d3cd14461caf1b42122dda1800e

Try this medicine
gec?
What. .
National Library, Kolkata - central AC and can accomodate a few thousand. I got a lifetime membership for a few hundred rupees back in school
Don't be afraid, be vigilant.
Good deal. .
What eye infection? There is nothing about that in the news.
Google Earth Coordinates, I suppose..
Can we see like cats are nights?
my boyfriend used to study there for neet prep. such a nice place
Hopefully ðŸ¤žðŸ˜Š

Wow my city library is old seems like the whole place is rusty . Even if my city  is known for many famouthings and some tier 2 clgs are also here . But still never ever imagined the city library to be as good as this.
Wareen Hastings ghost pays a visit to thank if you stay the night
